item.title: Using QGIS from Conda
item.description: QGIS recipes have been available on Conda for a while, but now, that they work for the three main operating systems, getting QGIS from Conda is s starting to become a reliable alternative to other QGIS distributions. Anyway, let’s rewind a bit… What is Conda? Why is that of any relevance? Conda provides a similar way to build, package and install QGIS (or any other software) in Linux, Windows, and Mac.
